main.name: Ugur (Ian) Pekunsal
main.description: I am a recent software engineering graduate. Actively looking for a new job opportunity

resume.skillmessage: Below are a short list of my current skills. I am growing this list continuously.

education.description: My first experience with computer science was in grade 11.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: ● Conducted mission-critical code fixes throughout all layers of a large-scale web application Utilizing Java, Node.js, Javascript, JQuery, and Oracle. ● Coordinated with members of all tiers within and outside of the organization. ● Performed software enhancement and tested newly implemented processes.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description: ● Educated customers of various Muskoka and Beau's products via one-on-one interaction. ● Submitted detailed, accurate reports for inventory, payroll hours, and material used.
